description: Rico Romero"The Rocket-Launcher"Ht: 5'10" WT: 155lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Marcus Isaacs"The Iceman"Ht: 5'10" WT: 165lbsSeason W/L record (0-1) This week on Naked Kombat Marcus "The Iceman" Isaacs returns after losing his first match to Leo "The Force" Forte. Iceman says he's been working out constantly and focusing on his cardio, staying as fit as possible for the match in store. Challenging The Iceman we have first timer Rico "The Rocket-Launcher" Romero. Rocket-Launcher says he's got killer legs and plans on locking up his opponent, making sure he doesn't go anywhere. It's a close match through all three rounds as these two studs fight neck and neck. Despite the points being so close, only one man can come out on top. The winner enjoys his prize by feeding the loser a mouthful of cock and fucking him hard in the ass before giving him what every loser deserves....a face full of cum!
title: Rico "The Rocket-Launcher" Romero vs Marcus "The Iceman" Isaacs
